name: Jetpackman
description:
"Jetpackman" is a side-view jetpack simulator. First, the player needs to start taking off and control the hero while avoiding colliding with the walls. In addition to planning, you will also have to monitor the fuel indicator if it runs out which will lead to an accident. In addition to collecting gas bubbles, the player will need to safely land a person on the finishing platform, which is quite difficult.

Game Features:
  • 30 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Old-school gameplay
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Nice pixel graphics
